verse.roman:
yas tayor ātmajaḥ kalpa
ātmanā ca dhanena ca
vṛttiṁ na dadyāt taṁ pretya
sva-māṁsaṁ khādayanti hi

synonyms: yaḥ—who; tayoḥ—of them; ātma-jaḥ—a son; kalpaḥ—capable; ātmanā—with his physical resources; ca—and; dhanena—with his wealth; ca—also; vṛttim—a livelihood; na dadyāt—does not give; tam—him; pretya—after passing away; sva—his own; māṁsam—flesh; khādayanti—they make eat; hi—indeed.
translation: A son who, though able to do so, fails to provide for his parents with his physical resources and wealth is forced after his death to eat his own flesh.
